mapper.select: SELECT S.BOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DETAIL, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_VIEWS, PLACE, TO_CHAR(FIND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "FIND_DATE", S.BOARD_TYPE, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLE_IMG" FROM SALE_MISSING S JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_ID) JOIN ATTACHMENT_ADOPT ON (REF_ANO = BOARD_NO) WHERE S.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} ORDER BY S.BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALE_MISSING ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_DETAIL, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_VIEWS, PLACE, FIND_DATE, BOARD_TYPE, ADOPT_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_AANO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{memberId}, #{boardDetail}, #{boardDate}, #{boardViews}, #{place}, #{findDate}, #{boardType}, #{adoptCategory} )

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_ADOPT ( FILE_NO, REF_ANO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_AFNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_AANO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{boardType} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_VIEWS, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLE_IMG", BOARD_DETAIL FROM SALE_MISSING JOIN ATTACHMENT_ADOPT ON (REF_ANO = BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}
